segments.text: Excuse me . Can I get a refund of my ticket ? I have to cancel my trip because I have something emergent to deal with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which train is the ticket for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is Train No . 249 . It will depart in four hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is not too late . Pass your ticket to me , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is the cancellation fee ?
segments.speaker: S1
